title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about the Finyzer Assets.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we'll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. We offer flexible plans to suit your needs.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. We offer a hassle-free cancellation process.

faqs.question: Can other info be added to an invoice?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add additional information to your invoices as needed.

faqs.question: How does billing work?
faqs.answer: We bill on a monthly or annual basis depending on your chosen plan.

faqs.question: How do I change my account email?
faqs.answer: You can change your account email from your account settings page.
